name: Dude! Where are my legs ?!?!
description:
Dude, where are my legs?

This game is about a dude, who lost his legs in a maze. 

You will succeed if you bring them together.

This games includes:

  • A Body
  • A pair of legs
  • Some riddles
  • Dark Music
  • Did i mention the legs already?

Have fun with the first level we were able to create for the GMTK Gamejam 2021.
